full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL PA'I SKUS GSOL 'DEBS KYI BRTAN BZHUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI LHUN GRUB RTZE BA DBUL DPON CHOS RJE NO MO KHANG GIS, RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL BA'I SKU LA GSOL 'DEBS KYI SHLOO KA BCU TSANG BA ZHIG CES KYANG DGOS, RGYUD RING PO NAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS PAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG LNGA 'BYUNG BA LA GZHI RGYAS TE, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZI CHUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SMRA BA'O, ,)
